cars.description: This is an immaculate 2007 Nissan Sentra with only 30000 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is a newer model 2012 Honda Civic with only 25000 miles on it. Decked out in the finest specs.
Our prized viper is the newest model out that goes from 0 to 60 in half of a second and will outrun any police car.
The fastest car in the world!! The Venom GT was recorded as exceeding 270.49 mph.
